div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"54.DocumentViewer._README.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Use this widget if you want to display PDF files inline in your Mendix application.\r\n\r\nThe ExampleImplementation folder includes a page with the widget and a microflow to translate the fileID to a Long. The reason for this is to make it work in offline mode (PWA) as well."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"54.DocumentViewer._README.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Add the DocumentViewer widget to a dataview. If you have a FileDocument entity or specialization, add a second fileID attribute of type long. Make sure that when the widget is used, this contains the fileID of the document. Select the new fileID attribute as fileID attirbute in the widget and add the changedDate in the third widget attribute."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"54.DocumentViewer._README.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"If you like to use a base64 implementation the changedDate is not needed so both changedDate and fileID can be left empty."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"54.DocumentViewer._README.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"It is now possible to use dynamic labels for the buttons and page counter. In order for the page counter to work, you will need to add both a %pageNumber% and %totalPages% placeholder in your text. Use this exact formatting as it might otherwise not work."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}],"listenTargets":[]
